name: Katana (Byzantine)
description:
(if you have low framerate try downloading it rather than playing in browser, RAM can be limited :/)

Katana

You play as superhuman international assassin Katana, who is so fast she experiences everything in slow motion, and has the ability to teleport.

Right click to teleport, left click to slash terrorists and diffuse the bomb, and escape to pause.

You must eliminate all of the terrorists before diffusing the bomb, because otherwise they will manually override the detonator.

If you are shot or diffuse the bomb before killing all of the terrorists you will die and the building will be blown up.

Good luck Katana.

This game was made in a (full) week for 

PB & Game Jam 2
